description: Simple test project to validate Ralph autonomous coding loop

user_stories.title: Create Hello World Utility
user_stories.description: Create a simple TypeScript utility function that returns 'Hello Ralph!' when called

user_stories.title: Add User Greeting Component
user_stories.description: Create a React component that displays personalized greeting using the hello utility. Component should accept a name prop and display 'Hello [name]!' with proper styling.
acceptance_criteria: Component uses hello() utility from story-001

user_stories.title: Create Greeting API Endpoint
user_stories.description: Create Next.js API route that returns greeting data. Should accept GET request with name parameter and return JSON with greeting message.
acceptance_criteria: Accepts GET request with 'name' query parameter
Returns JSON: { message: string, timestamp: string }
Proper error handling for missing name parameter

technical_constraints: Must use TypeScript with strict mode
Must use Next.js 14+ with App Router
All code must pass TypeScript compilation
All code must pass ESLint validation
quality_gates: No console.log statements in production code
